text: Shim Wan-joon (born 1980) is a South Korean actor. He is known for his roles in Hi Bye, Mama!, Queen of Mystery and Tomorrow, With You. ==Filmography== ===Television series=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Title!! Role!!
